RAGNode_233.name: vectorDB
RAGNode_233.label: Database
RAGNode_233.description: Select the vector database to be queried.

RAGNode_233.name: embeddingModelName
RAGNode_233.label: Embedding Model Name
RAGNode_233.description: This field allows the user to select the embedding model used to embed the query into vector space. It loads available embedding models through the listModels method.

RAGNode_233.name: generativeModelName
RAGNode_233.label: Generative Model Name
RAGNode_233.description: Select the model to generate responses from the query results.

slackNode_156.label: Channel
slackNode_156.description: Specify the Slack channel by selecting from a list or providing the name.
